/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from an elevated position, providing a panoramic view of the cityscape below. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
